name: Citeseerextractor
body:
### Welcome to CiteSeerExtractor
CiteSeerExtractor is an automatic metadata and citations extractor for scholarly documents. It is currently in use in [CiteSeerX](http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu), [SeerSuite](http://citeseerx.sourceforge.net/), and a number of other scholar digital library projects.

CiteSeerExtractor leverages existing extraction tools, such as SVMHeaderParse and [ParsCit](http://wing.comp.nus.edu.sg/parsCit/) and can either be run from the command line, as a stand-alone Web server, or integrated into an existing application.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
